title: Arvind Kejriwal declares jailed MLA Chaitar Vasava as Lok Sabha candidate from Gujarat's Bharuch
summarized_content: a local court in dediapada in narmada district on december 18 sent chaitar to judicial custody at the end of the three-day police remand in the case of alleged extortion and assault of forest officials.delhi chief minister and  () chief  declared mla  a tribal leader who is currently in jail as the candidate from bharuch parliamentary constituency for the upcoming lok sabha polls.kejriwal said that if chaitar vasava's bail is rejected the party would fight the lok sabha polls on his behalf.aam aadmi party (aap) named chaitar vasava who is currently in jail as the party's candidate from gujarat's bharuch for the upcoming.while addressing a rally at netramg in bharuch district along with his punjab counterpart bhagwant mann kejriwal accused the bjp of being against the tribals.the aam aadmi party has started the lok sabha election campaign by organising a public rally in bharuch.kejriwal while addressing the rally appealed to the people to ensure the victory of chaitra vasava in the lok sabha elections.

title: Will field Vasava even from jail, says Arvind Kejriwal
summarized_content: will field vasava even from jail says arvind kejriwal  india news - times of india.editionintrendingwill field vasava even from jail says arvind kejriwaltnn  updated jan 9 2024 0450 istshareaatext size file photo aap national convenor and delhi cm arvind kejriwal said on monday that they are "trying to get bail for chaitar vasava (aap mla) from the supreme court" and "even if he doesn't come out (of jail) the party will contest the lok sabha polls in his name".follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin indiaentire website.will field vasava even from jail says arvind kejriwaltnn  updated jan 9 2024 0450 istshareaatext size.tnn  updated jan 9 2024 0450 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.file photo aap national convenor and delhi cm arvind kejriwal said on monday that they are "trying to get bail for chaitar vasava (aap mla) from the supreme court" and "even if he doesn't come out (of jail) the party will contest the lok sabha polls in his name".for reprint rights times syndication service.trendingwill field vasava even from jail says arvind kejriwaltnn  updated jan 9 2024 0450 istshareaatext size file photo aap national convenor and delhi cm arvind kejriwal said on monday that they are "trying to get bail for chaitar vasava (aap mla) from the supreme court" and "even if he doesn't come out (of jail) the party will contest the lok sabha polls in his name".aap national convenor and delhi cm arvind kejriwal said on monday that they are "trying to get bail for chaitar vasava (aap mla) from the supreme court" and "even if he doesn't come out (of jail) the party will contest the lok sabha polls in his name".other times group news sites.popular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices.hot on the web.trending topics.living and entertainment.services.© 2024 bennett coleman & co.ltd.

title: Bilkis Bano case: PM, BJP should apologise to nation and daughters of the country, says Opp
summarized_content: (image source pti)the opposition on monday demanded that the prime minister and the bjp should apologise to the women and the country after the supreme court quashed the gujarat government’s decision to grant remission to 11 convicts in the.welcoming the sc decision ordering all the convicts to be sent back to jail within two weeks aap national joint secretary gopal italia said that those convicted by courts of law in rape cases “should not be granted pardon under any constitutional law”.with pti inputs.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 09-01-2024 at 0219 ist.live blog.the opposition on monday demanded that the prime minister and the bjp should apologise to the women and the country after the supreme court quashed the gujarat government’s decision to grant remission to 11 convicts in the when governments put aside law and take decisions it is the duty of the sc to step in and protect the spirit of justice… it has upheld hopes of the people” he added.congratulations to bilkis bano for continuing her fight bravely.”.mahila congress president alka lamba said “the prime minister and the bjp should apologise to the nation and the daughters of the country in the wake of the supreme court judgment.addressing the media congress spokesperson abhishek singhvi called the bjp government a “jumle ki sarkar” which raises slogans like “beti bachao beti padhao” but protects the rapists.“it appears to work to save the culprits rather than get justice for victims and this is very well proved by the supreme court’s judgment… this is not the only instance there have been many such cases where the government has shielded those who commit a crime rather than protect the victims” he said.

title: AAP MPs Sanjay Singh & ND Gupta, ex-DCW chief Maliwal file Rajya Sabha poll nominations
summarized_content: aap mps sanjay singh & nd gupta ex-dcw chief maliwal file rajya sabha poll nominations.as per the ec’s schedule polling will take place from 9 am to 4 pm for state assemblies and counting of votes will be at 5 pm on january 19.new delhi  updated january 9 2024  0820 ist.(above) aap leaders sanjay singh and (left) swati maliwal and nd gupta after filing their nomination for the rajya sabha polls monday.posting a video of singh stepping out of the police van aap posted on x “public leader sanjay singh azad will again raise the voice of the public in the house…”.his wife anita singh and father dinesh singh were also present when he filed his papers at transport bhawan.according to the affidavits submitted by the leaders sanjay singh and his wife have combined movable assets of over rs 31 lakh in their bank accounts.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 08-01-2024 at 2338 ist.live blog.amid police security aap mp sanjay singh who was arrested by the enforcement directorate (ed) in a money laundering case related to the excise policy stepped out of jail monday to file his nomination for the upcoming rajya sabha polls at civil lines.currently he is also the aap’s uttar pradesh in-charge.

title: At AAP’s Main Bhi Kejriwal Jan Samvad, party leaders lash out at BJP’s ‘conspiracy’
summarized_content: “delhiites voted in the name of arvind kejriwal people want kejriwal to continue as delhi’s cm… the bjp wants to arrest arvind kejriwal and finish the aap because the bjp knows that they cannot win elections in delhi against arvind kejriwal” said bharadwaj.under this campaign titled ‘main bhi kejriwal’ aap leaders asked the people in the wards they are visiting whether kejriwal should resign if he is arrested or continue running the government from jail.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 08-01-2024 at 0855 ist.live blog.after its door-to-door campaign the aam aadmi party (aap) began its jan samvad (public dialogue meeting) in every ward and senior party leaders including cabinet minister saurabh bhardwaj atishi and others addressed the public in their respective constituencies.at aap’s main bhi kejriwal jan samvad party leaders lash out at bjp’s ‘conspiracy’.aap leaders asked the people whether arvind kejriwal should resign if he is arrested or continue running the government from jail.calling the ’s allegations false and baseless atishi said kejriwal has worked honestly for the past eight years resulting in numerous facilities for  residents including excellent education world-class healthcare free electricity and water affordable bus travel and free pilgrimage trips for senior citizens.

title: Lok Sabha seat-sharing on agenda, AAP, Congress to meet today
summarized_content: like in punjab concerns have been raised about the impact an alliance at the national level will have at the level of the assembly.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 08-01-2024 at 0506 ist.live blog.discussion on seat sharing between the aam aadmi party (aap) and congress as part of the india bloc is scheduled to take place in delhi on monday.congress sources meanwhile said the party was likely to stake claim to five of the seven lok sabha seats in the capital based on its performance in the 2019 general elections.the five seats were likely to include chandni chowk northeast delhi east delhi new delhi and west delhi where the congress was in second place in terms of vote share compared to the aap.according to sources the discussion will be limited to delhi and seat-sharing in punjab or goa or gujarat is not on the agenda.

title: “Miles to go before I sleep...”: Arvind Kejriwal after rise in Delhi’s per capita income
summarized_content: looks like you are already logged in from more than 3 devices!to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.a 'statistical handbook-2023' released on saturday by the economic and statistics department of the kejriwal government said delhi's per capita income increased from ₹389529 to ₹444768 a 14 per cent yearly rise and is 158 per cent higher than the national average per capita income.planning minister atishi further noted that despite facing various challenges in the year 2023 the commitment of the kejriwal government remained focused on the welfare of the people of delhi and the progress of delhi.delhi’s per capita income rises 14% to ₹444768 from ₹389529 says kejriwal government’s economic and statistics department.share.read later.delhi cm arvind kejriwal.photo credit.ani.chief minister arvind kejriwal attributed the rise in per capita income in  to innovation and forward-looking steps that have been taken under his leadership over the past nine years.coming back to the statistical handbook released by the delhi government it noted that the number of electricity consumers increased by nearly 2.8 lakhs and more than 1 lakh water connections were added in 2022-23.more than 3.41 crores of electricity no bill generated in 2022-23 it asserted.

title: Today in Politics: Nadda in J&K to firm up LS poll plan; Congress, AAP may kick off seat-sharing talks
summarized_content: already in bihar its allies such as the jd(u) led by chief minister  – who is angling for the india alliance’s convener post – and the rjd have demanded 17 seats each leaving 4 for the congress and 2 for the cpi(ml) of the total 40 parliamentary seats in the state  and santosh singh.if top leaders of rjd and jd(u) concede a little more it could be 16 seats each to rjd and jd(u) five to congress two to cpi(ml) and one to cpi.”.at a press conference on saturday congress president  said the india bloc would decide on allocation of posts including the national convener’s position in the next 10-15 days and that other matters such as seat sharing would be resolved by month-end according to party sources.it is usual for the cec and ecs to tour the states ahead of the assembly or lok sabha elections to meet political parties senior police and administrative officials and its ground poll machinery.on sunday the congress is likely to start the process of its seat-sharing talks with the  (aap) for punjab and  amid their strained ties and uneasy equations.kharge claimed the congress is working on all the 545 lok sabha constituencies and has appointed observers for all the seats but which alliance partner will contest which seat and how many will be decided soon after consultations with all its constituents.

title: Health secretary hits back as Delhi Minister Saurabh Bharadwaj says he didn’t follow orders
summarized_content: it’s strange that instead of appreciation for the proactive work of the health department which is his as well he wants the suspension of the secretary and dghs.”.meanwhile bharadwaj attacked the  for “propaganda” that the drugs were spurious or counterfeit.health secretary hits back as delhi minister saurabh bharadwaj says he didn’t follow orders.breaking his silence health secretary sb deepak kumar against whom the minister has levelled allegations ranging from seeking to derail the farishtey scheme to the matter of spurious drugs and an alleged scam in pathological tests at mohalla clinics termed bharadwaj's accusations “baseless” “pure lies” and “half truths”.welcoming the move bharadwaj reiterated that he had ordered the audit of drugs in circulation at such facilities as soon as he took on the portfolio alleging that the “health secretary did not comply” with his directions.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 06-01-2024 at 0533 ist.live blog.the ongoing tussle between health minister saurabh bharadwaj and the health secretary over the supply of  at the delhi government hospitals and mohalla clinics came to a head friday after the ministry of home affairs (mha).breaking his silence health secretary sb deepak kumar against whom the minister has levelled allegations ranging from seeking to derail the farishtey scheme to the matter of spurious drugs and an alleged scam in pathological tests at mohalla clinics termed bharadwaj’s accusations “baseless” “pure lies” and “half truths”.

title: Assault accused denied admission: Delhi Health Department recommends suspension of 4 doctors
summarized_content: “they have been asked to report as to when did the patient come to the hospitals the doctor who attended to him the time he spent waiting to get treatment cctv footage and the doctor on duty who allegedly denied treatment and admission to the patient” they added.assault accused denied admission delhi health department recommends suspension of 4 doctors.written by.new delhi  updated january 6 2024  0725 ist.the department will also write to the delhi medical council (dmc) to inform the body about the alleged medical negligence.sources further said “be it an accused or any other person a hospital should provide treatment to people from any background…”.said a source “we will also be writing to dmc for medical negligence… the recommendation for disciplinary action and suspension against the four doctors (two from gtb and two from lnjp) will be sent to the national capital civil services authority (nccsa) for further approval” said the senior official.the department will also write to the  medical council (dmc) to inform the body about the alleged medical negligence.“the patient was first taken to jpc hospital where he was intubated and sent to gtb…gtb hospital then sent him to lnjp….one of the hospitals refused to give the patient even a stretcher to lie on while waiting for a doctor.

title: Kejriwal fails to appear before Goa court, cites busy schedule
summarized_content: the case was registered against kejriwal for bribery and punishment for bribery under the representation of the people act and indian penal code respectively.kejriwal fails to appear before goa court cites busy schedule jan 6 2024 0444 istshareaatext size.jan 6 2024 0444 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.panaji delhi chief minister and aam aadmi party (aap) national convener arvind kejriwal didn’t appear in mapusa court on friday.advocate surel tilve who is also the secretary of aap in goa sought exemption from his appearance stating that kejriwal couldn’t appear in the court due to the ongoing rajya sabha nominations for delhi besides preparations for the republic day.kejriwal was issued summons in november 2023 to appear before the court.kejriwal fails to appear before goa court cites busy schedule  goa news - times of india.editionintrendingkejriwal fails to appear before goa court cites busy schedule jan 6 2024 0444 istshareaatext size  panaji delhi chief minister and aam aadmi party (aap) national convener arvind kejriwal didn’t appear in mapusa court on friday.visual stories.elections.top trends.trending storiesin cityentire website.in cityentire website.entire website.follow us onother times group news sitespopular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices © 2024 bennett coleman & co.ltd.for reprint rights times syndication service.trendingkejriwal fails to appear before goa court cites busy schedule jan 6 2024 0444 istshareaatext size  panaji delhi chief minister and aam aadmi party (aap) national convener arvind kejriwal didn’t appear in mapusa court on friday.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin cityentire websitefollow us onother times group news sitespopular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices © 2024 bennett coleman & co.

title: Arvind Kejriwal & Bhagwant Mann will address the Maha Badlav Maha Sabha on January 28 : AAP
summarized_content: "aam aadmi party's maha badlav sabha on january 28 will be the biggest sabha in the history of state" added dhanda.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin cityentire website.arvind kejriwal & bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav maha sabha on january 28  aap  tnn   jan 5 2024 2149 istshareaatext size.tnn   jan 5 2024 2149 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.punjab cm bhagwant mann and delhi cm arvind kejriwal (pti file photo) jind aam aadmi party senior vice president anurag dhanda said that national convenor of aam aadmi party arvind kejriwal & the chief minister of punjab bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav sabha going to be held in jind on january 28.he was addressing media on the sideline of the party workers meet held in jind on friday.arvind kejriwal & bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav maha sabha on january 28  aap  chandigarh news - times of india.editionintrendingarvind kejriwal & bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav maha sabha on january 28  aap  tnn   jan 5 2024 2149 istshareaatext size punjab cm bhagwant mann and delhi cm arvind kejriwal (pti file photo) jind aam aadmi party senior vice president anurag dhanda said that national convenor of aam aadmi party arvind kejriwal & the chief minister of punjab bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav sabha going to be held in jind on january 28.jind aam aadmi party senior vice president anurag dhanda said that national convenor of aam aadmi party arvind kejriwal & the chief minister of punjab bhagwant mann will address the maha badlav sabha going to be held in jind on january 28.the people of haryana are waiting with bated breath for arvind kejriwal to come and repay the debt of their motherland said dhanda.he said the facilities kejriwal provided to the people of delhi and punjab will also be provided to the people of haryana.

title: Arvind Kejriwal greets Manish Sisodia on birthday; says his courage is inspiring
summarized_content: my salute to the best education minister of the country" atishi wrote on x.the alleged liquor scam was related to the excise policy in 2021-22 that was scrapped by the aap government in 2022 soon after lg vk saxena recommended a cbi probe into its implementation.arvind kejriwal greets manish sisodia on birthday; says his courage is inspiringpti  updated jan 5 2024 1736 istshareaatext size.pti  updated jan 5 2024 1736 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal on friday greeted his former deputy manish sisodia on his birthday and said he lauds his courage in an "era of dictatorship." my salute to the best education minister of the country" atishi wrote on x.image posted by delhi cm arvind kejriwal on x (formerly twitter) new delhi delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal on friday greeted his former deputy manish sisodia on his birthday and said he lauds his courage in an "era of dictatorship".arvind kejriwal greets manish sisodia on birthday; says his courage is inspiring  delhi news - times of india.editionintrendingarvind kejriwal greets manish sisodia on birthday; says his courage is inspiringpti  updated jan 5 2024 1736 istshareaatext sizedelhi chief minister arvind kejriwal on friday greeted his former deputy manish sisodia on his birthday and said he lauds his courage in an "era of dictatorship.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin cityentire websitefollow us onother times group news sitespopular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices © 2024 bennett coleman & co.ltd.for reprint rights times syndication service.trendingarvind kejriwal greets manish sisodia on birthday; says his courage is inspiringpti  updated jan 5 2024 1736 istshareaatext sizedelhi chief minister arvind kejriwal on friday greeted his former deputy manish sisodia on his birthday and said he lauds his courage in an "era of dictatorship.

title: "Yeh Dosti Bahut...": Arvind Kejriwal's Birthday Wish For Manish Sisodia
summarized_content: mr sisodia resigned from the delhi cabinet on february 28.the delhi government implemented the new excise policy on november 17 2021 but scrapped it by the end of september 2022 amid allegations of corruption.track  live on ndtv.com and get  updates from  and around the.the ed has said it will issue fresh summons.mr kejriwal who heads the aap has alleged the centre wants to stop him from campaigning for the national election by arresting him.

title: ED summons: Sharad Pawar backs Kejriwal, accuses Centre of misusing power
summarized_content: the alleged liquor scam is related to the excise policy 2021-22 that was scrapped by kejriwal's government last year after delhi lieutenant governor vk saxena recommended a cbi probe into "lapses and irregularities" in its implementation.sharad pawar expressed support for arvind kejriwal in light of the enforcement directorate summoning him shirdi backing delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal over enforcement directorate summoning him nationalist congress party president sharad pawar on thursday said the centre was misusing power to discourage those who do not have similar political views.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin indiaentire website.ed summons sharad pawar backs kejriwal accuses centre of misusing powerpti  updated jan 5 2024 0930 istshareaatext size.pti  updated jan 5 2024 0930 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.sharad pawar the president of the nationalist congress party expressed support for delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal in light of the enforcement directorate summoning him.ed summons sharad pawar backs kejriwal accuses centre of misusing power  india news - times of india.editionintrendinged summons sharad pawar backs kejriwal accuses centre of misusing powerpti  updated jan 5 2024 0930 istshareaatext sizesharad pawar the president of the nationalist congress party expressed support for delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal in light of the enforcement directorate summoning him.for reprint rights times syndication service.other times group news sites.popular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices.hot on the web.trending topics.living and entertainment.services.© 2024 bennett coleman & co.ltd.pawar said in the last 10 years people have voted kejriwal to power adding that aam aadmi party ministers have been jailed and steps were being taken to arrest him as well.

title: Arvind Kejriwal off to Gujarat on 3-day trip from Saturday
summarized_content: vasava had surrendered on december 15 in a case related to alleged threats to forest department personnel and firing a round in the air.though aap leaders claimed the visit was planned beforehand the timing and choice of state - pm narendra modi's home turf - is seen as significant given that kejriwal has alleged that ed is trying to arrest him at the behest of the central government and that the centre is weaponising investigating agencies against opposition leaders.in an online press conference on thursday kejriwal claimed that ed's repeated summons in the alleged liquor scam ahead of lok sabha polls were an attempt to hinder his campaigning.

title: Government wants to arrest me before LS polls: Arvind Kejriwal
summarized_content: coming out in his defence kejriwal's party colleagues and ministers atishi and saurabh bharadwaj addressed separate press conferences and alleged bjp was trying to prevent the aap national convener from campaigning for the ls polls.government wants to arrest me before ls polls arvind kejriwaltnn  updated jan 5 2024 0220 istshareaatext size.tnn  updated jan 5 2024 0220 istshareaatext size.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.arvind kejriwal the chief minister of delhi alleges that the government wants to arrest him to prevent him from campaigning for the upcoming lok sabha polls.delhi cm arvind kejriwal (photo agencies) new delhi a day after skipping the summons to appear before the enforcement directorate for the third time chief minister arvind kejriwal on thursday alleged government wanted to arrest him and prevent him from campaigning for the upcoming lok sabha polls.addressing the media through a digital press briefing kejriwal said the summons sent to him was aimed at attacking his honesty and defame him and that there had been no corruption in implementation of the excise policy.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin indiaentire websitefollow us onother times group news sitespopular categorieshot on the webtop trendstrending topicsliving and entertainmentservices © 2024 bennett coleman & co.ltd.government wants to arrest me before ls polls arvind kejriwal  india news - times of india.editionintrendinggovernment wants to arrest me before ls polls arvind kejriwaltnn  updated jan 5 2024 0220 istshareaatext sizearvind kejriwal the chief minister of delhi alleges that the government wants to arrest him to prevent him from campaigning for the upcoming lok sabha polls.the  wants to arrest me to stop me from campaigning for the lok sabha polls" the aap national convener said adding he would cooperate with the investigating agency provided he was issued legally valid summons.

title: BJP wants me arrested to stop from campaigning for LS polls: Kejriwal calls ED summons 'illegal'
summarized_content: the truth is that there was no corruption of any kind if it had happened then money would also have been received" he said.kejriwal said the aap has been able to stand against the bjp because it is not involved in corruption.he added that if his party leaders had been involved in any irregularities then they would have joined the saffron outfit like other "corrupt" leaders did.meanwhile kejriwal announced his three-day poll campaigning in gujarat beginning saturday.in a related development the aap leaders claimed that the roads leading to kejriwal's residence here were blocked and the police personnel deployed at all gates as the ed was "gearing up" to raid and arrest the delhi chief minister.the delhi police however said that security around the chief minister's house was beefed up to "manage" the mediapersons who have gathered there since wednesday after aap leaders claimed that kejriwal would be raided and arrested.sources said the ed is currently examining kejriwal's five-page reply sent to the investigating officer of the case on wednesday and may reject his charges of calling the summons illegal.the agency may issue its fourth summons to kejriwal as per provisions of the prevention of money laundering act (pmla) they said.aap leader atishi who is a minister in kejriwal's government charged that the probe agencies were not able to present any evidence or begin trial in the alleged liquor scam because there was no evidence with them despite two years of investigation.she alleged that it was bjp's standing operating procedure to use the pmla against the leaders of opposition parties because getting bail in such cases was almost impossible.the alleged liquor scam is nothing but a "political conspiracy" atishi charged.bjp wants me arrested to stop from campaigning for ls polls kejriwal calls ed summons 'illegal'  india news - times of india.editionintrendingbjp wants me arrested to stop from campaigning for ls polls kejriwal calls ed summons 'illegal'pti   jan 4 2024 1816 istshareaatext size delhi cm arvind kejriwal  new delhi delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal on thursday alleged the bjp-led central government wanted to arrest him and prevent from campaigning for the upcoming lok sabha polls saying the ed summons issued to him was aimed at hurting his "biggest asset" honesty and defaming him.kejriwal however said that he would cooperate with the enforcement directorate (ed) provided he was issued legally valid summons.

title: Delhi BJP Chief Claims Arvind Kejriwal Is "Running Away" From Probe Agency
summarized_content: watch live newsfollow us.arvind kejriwal was first called by the central agency to appear on november 2.new delhi the delhi bjp chief virendra sachedva launched an attack on the aam aadmi party and the delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal after the aap claimed that the enforcement directorate was going to arrest arvind kejriwal.mr sachedva dubbed the aap as "choro ki baraat" (procession of thieves) who were making noise and mourning for delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal as he is running away from the investigation agency.speaking to ani the delhi bjp chief said "since morning i have been watching the 'choro ki baraat' (procession of thieves) making noise and mourning for kejriwal.he further alleged that the said summons appeared to be politically motivated and issued for extraneous considerations.promotedlisten to the meanwhile the aap also questioned the timing of the notice just before the 2024 lok sabha elections.mr kejriwal further questioned the agency for not responding to his earlier replies when the summons was sent to him and he had raised certain queries on the nature of the agency's investigation.in his written reply to the enforcement directorate the delhi chief minister said "as a premier investigating agency the non-disclosure and non-response approach adopted by you cannot sustain the test of law equity or justice.

title: Enforcement Directorate likely to arrest Kejriwal: AAP
summarized_content: looks like you are already logged in from more than 3 devices!to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.kejriwal questioned the timing of the ed’s summons which he said was meant to stop him from campaigning in the coming lok sabha elections.he reiterated his earlier charges stating that the agencies are being used to intimidate the opposition.the police has increased its deployment around kejriwal’s official residence to avoid any untoward incident as aap leaders expressed fear that the delhi cm will be arrested on thursday.he has refused to join the probe despite three summons issued to him.published on january 4 2024  comment now.comment now.you might also likeyou might also like.commentscomments have to be in english and in full sentences.similarly over the last 24 hours every bjp leader has said kejriwal will be arrested.last evening aap leader and delhi’s law and pwd minister atishi posted on x “news coming in that ed is going to raid @arvindkejriwal’s residence tomorrow morning.

title: Arvind Kejriwal will cooperate if ED sends #39;legal#39; summons: AAP
Delhi excise policy case: ED may issue fresh summons to Arvind Kejriwal - Top developments
summarized_content: delhi excise policy case ed may issue fresh summons to arvind kejriwal - top developments  india news - times of india.editionintrendingdelhi excise policy case ed may issue fresh summons to arvind kejriwal - top developments  timesofindia.com   jan 4 2024 1124 istshareaatext size delhi cm arvind kejriwal delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal did not appear before the enforcement directorate (ed) for the third time on wednesday in connection with the money laundering case linked to the now-defunct delhi excise policy 2021.kejriwal in a written reply to the ed said "as a premier investigating agency the non-disclosure and non-response approach adopted by you cannot sustain the test of law equity or justice.your obstinacy tantamount to assuming the role of judge jury and executioner at the same time which is not acceptable in our country governed by the rule of law."follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trendstrending storiesin indiaentire website.delhi excise policy case ed may issue fresh summons to arvind kejriwal - title: Arvind Kejriwal to leave for Gujarat on January 6: AAP sources
Delhi Liquor Policy Case LIVE Updates: Enforcement Directorate Likely To Issue Fresh Summons To Arvind Kejriwal
summarized_content: watch live newsfollow us.delhi liquor policy case arvind kejriwal was first called by central agency to appear on november 2new delhi the enforcement directorate is examining the reply sent by delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal regarding his refusal to appear before the agency and may issue its fourth summons to him to join the investigation in the alleged excise policy case according to sources.earlier this morning security outside the residence of  was tightened after aam aadmi party (aap) leaders claimed citing unnamed inputs that the directorate of enforcement (ed) is likely to arrest the aap convener today.these claims come after the delhi chief minister skipped the third summons issued to him by the probe agency on wednesday.he further alleged that the said summons appeared to be politically motivated and issued for extraneous considerations.meanwhile the aap also questioned the timing of the notice just before the 2024 lok sabha elections.here are the highlights on delhi liquor policy case get ndtv updatesturn on notifications to receive alerts as this story develops.track  live on ndtv.com and get  updates from  and around the.follow us.the enforcement directorate is examining the reply sent by delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal regarding his refusal to appear before the agency and may issue its fourth summons to him to join the investigation in the alleged excise policy case according to sources.

title: Three ED summons skipped, what next for Arvind Kejriwal?
summarized_content: "follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trends.delhi cm arvind kejriwal on wednesday once again skipped summons issued to him by the enforcement directorate (ed).he was previously called for questioning on november 2 and december 21 by the ed in connection with the money laundering case linked to the now-scrapped delhi excise policy 2021 - both summons he skipped.whythe delhi cm cited rajya sabha polls republic day preparations and the probe agency's "non-disclosure and non-response approach" as reasons for not appearing before the ed.he wrote to the ed saying that he would be "happy to answer" any questionnaire sent by it.meanwhile the aam aadmi party (aap) claimed that the summons were sent with the intention to arrest him.timesofindia.shareaatext size.aatext size.text size.delhi cm arvind kejriwal  delhi cm arvind kejriwal on wednesday once again skipped summons issued to him by the enforcement directorate (ed).com   jan 4 2024 0837 istshareaatext size delhi cm arvind kejriwal  delhi cm arvind kejriwal on wednesday once again skipped summons issued to him by the enforcement directorate (ed)."your obstinacy tantamounts to assuming the role of judge jury and executioner at the same time which is not acceptable in our country governed by the rule of law" the chief minister said in his reply to the summons.what next?the ed can move the court and seek a warrant requiring kejriwal to be available for questioning.on his part kejriwal can also move the court and seek anticipatory bail to prevent the ed from arresting him.the ed has already arrested former deputy cm manish sisodia and rajya sabha member sanjay singh in connection with the same case.about the authorthe toi news desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of the times of india worldwide.

title: AAP Claims Arvind Kejriwal To Be Arrested, Roads To His Residence Blocked
summarized_content: party sources said roads leading to mr kejriwal's home have been blocked by delhi police.this was the third notice to mr kejriwal also the aap's national convenor after he refused to appear before the enforcement directorate (ed) on two earlier summons for november 2 and december 21.sources said the ed's lawyers are examining mr kejriwal's response and fresh summons will be sent to him.his party said it was a plan to stop him from campaigning in the national election due later this year.promotedlisten to the with three of its leaders -- manish sisodia sanjay singh and satyendra jain -- in jail the aap has long been anticipating the eventuality and has discussed the possible courses of action.

title: Today in Politics: Is Kejriwal set to be arrested by ED? AAP pitch ups the ante in tussle with BJP
summarized_content: besides taking stock of the congress’s readiness for the upcoming lok sabha polls the meeting will discuss the party’s preparations for the yatra which is being pitched as its biggest public outreach programme ahead of the polls.congress high-level meet.the congress is gearing up for the  that senior party leader  is set to undertake from january 14.multiple levels of deliberations are being held for this east-to-west yatra which is set to cover 6200 kilometres across 14 states from manipur to maharashtra.— dr.sandeep pathak (@sandeeppathak04).on wednesday kejriwal skipped the third summons by the ed in connection with the delhi liquor policy case and cited  polls republic day preparations and the probe agency’s “non-disclosure and non-response approach” as reasons for not appearing before it.the party will also look into the activities that it will undertake in states that the yatra would not traverse so as to keep the momentum going in this critical election season.— with inputs from pti.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 04-01-2024 at 0651 ist.live blog.several aam aadmi party (aap) leaders including delhi ministers took to social media late wednesday night to express their apprehensions that  by the enforcement directorate (ed) in the delhi excise policy case on thursday morning.

title: ED assuming role of judge, jury & executioner: Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal
summarized_content: "as he is not cooperating the trial may get delayed as the ed cannot wind up the probe without looking into the culpability of aap and its leadership in the excise policy scam" a source said.during its probe the ed claims to have found that all public comments to the draft excise policy were allegedly generated by one person a major evidence that needs to be corroborated from the head of the government and the leadership of aap which is alleged to be the end beneficiary of the "proceeds of crime".

title: Be It Arvind Kejriwal Or Hemant Soren, Every Corrupt Leader Will Be Punished: BJP
summarized_content: “outright dishonest and sinister arvind kejriwal is shaking in fear and making one after another lame excuse to skip ed summons” bhatia claimed-  -.“it won’t be wrong to say that kejriwal is afraid today because he knows that his arrest is imminent he is aware that he is the kingpin and has no answers (to ed’s questions).referring to media reports claiming that soren plans to step down as jharkhand chief minister and install his wife kalpana soren as his successor in view of his “imminent arrest” bhatia said “they (jmm) are preparing for the consequences of an arrest that could be made by the investigative agency as it comes under its domain.bhatia also targeted the india bloc of opposition parties questioning their “silence” on the issue of corruption and slammed soren whose party jharkhand mukti morcha (jmm) is one of the constituents of the opposition alliance for skipping the ed’s summons.the party also questioned why kejriwal did not approach the courts if he felt the action against him was politically motivated.-  -.“gone are the days when corrupt leaders used to rule over the honest citizenry of the country.he is not able to muster the courage (to approach court) because he knows the truth that he is the kingpin of the liquor scam” bhatia further said.

title: Arvind Kejriwal To Be Arrested Today? AAP Leaders Raise Alarm
summarized_content: the enforcement directorate alleged laundering of the kickbacks.promotedlisten to the the bjp has alleged that the proceeds of the alleged scam were used by the aap to fund its large-scale campaign in gujarat in which it got a 12.91 per cent votes and established itself as a national party.the party has also taken a swipe at the delhi chief minister saying he is "shaking in fear" and is not appearing before the agency because he knows that he is the "kingpin" of the alleged liquor policy scam.track  live on ndtv.com and get  updates from  and around the.he has not been named as an accused in the case.mr kejriwal insists that the summons are "motivated" and says it is not clear whether he is being called as a witness or a suspect in the case.his party said it was a plan to stop him from campaigning in the national election due later this year.with three of its leaders -- manish sisodia sanjay singh and satyendra jain -- behind the bars aap has long been anticipating the eventuality and has discussed the possible courses of action.arrest likely.— atishi (@atishiaap) similar posts were seen on the handles of senior party leaders saurabh bhardwaj jasmine shah and sandeep pathak.सुनने में आ रहा है कल सुबह मुख्यमंत्री केजरीवाल जी के घर ed पहुँच कर उन्हें गिरफ़्तार करने वाली है ।— saurabh bharadwaj (@saurabh_mlagk) breakingsources confirm that ed is going to raid the residence of cm arvind kejriwal tomorrow morning.he is likely to be arrested.— jasmine shah (@jasmine441) mr kejriwal has skipped summons for questioning thrice.

summarized_content: topics.लेटेस्ट.the bjp has questioned arvind kejriwal's decision to skip the enforcement directorate summons asking whether he is trying to hide something.bjp national spokesperson gaurav bhatia said that arvind kejriwal thinks he is above the law.

title: "Judge, Jury, Executioner": Arvind Kejriwal Responds To Agency Summons
summarized_content: "vested interests""in these circumstances i therefore once again urge you to kindly respond to my earlier responses and clarify the position so as to enable me to understand the real intent ambit nature sweep and scope of the purported inquiryinvestigation for which i am being called" the aap chief added.he also alleged that while he was willing to cooperate and assist with any investigation the enforcement directorate's silence confirmed his apprehensions about "certain vested interests and extraneous as well as malafide considerations prevailing over any objective rational fair or impartial inquiry or investigations".the aam aadmi party has also questioned the timing of the summons and said that it had been sent with the intention of arresting him.watch live newsfollow us.mr kejriwal skipped the enforcement directorate's summons for the third time on wednesday.new delhi in his response to the enforcement directorate after he skipped its summons in connection with the liquor policy case for the third time delhi chief minister and aap chief arvind kejriwal has said he is busy with the republic day preparations and rajya sabha elections and would be "happy to answer" any questionnaire sent by the agency.follow us.in his response to the enforcement directorate after he skipped its summons in connection with the liquor policy case for the third time delhi chief minister and aap chief arvind kejriwal has said he is busy with the republic day preparations and rajya sabha elections and would be "happy to answer" any questionnaire sent by the agency.

title: Kejriwal cites Rajya Sabha polls, Republic Day celebrations and ED’s approach as he skips third summons
summarized_content: kejriwal said that he is fairly committed to the rule of law and would cooperate and assist in any “inquiry or investigations that may be as per law fair just and expedient” but the ed’s silence on his two letters in the past had confirmed his “apprehensions about certain vested interests and extraneous as well as malafide considerations prevailing over any objective rational fair or impartial inquiry or investigations”.“in the summons the column of ‘schedule’ and ‘as per annexure enclosed’ are struck off with pen and there is absolutely nothing mentioned in the summons as to whether any particular information material or document is required from me” kejriwal wrote in the previous response adding that similar notices without any specific details had been illegal and quashed by courts in the past.kejriwal cites rajya sabha polls republic day celebrations and ed’s approach as he skips third summons.in his letter to the ed arvind kejriwal said the central agency "assuming the role of judge jury and executioner at the same" is not acceptable.© the indian express pvt ltd.first uploaded on 03-01-2024 at 1733 ist.live blog.has cited rajya sabha elections republic day celebrations and the enforcement directorate’s ‘non-disclosure’ and ‘non-response’ approach as reasons for not appearing for questioning before the investigating agency in the excise policy case on wednesday.kejriwal was issued the first summons by ed in october last year which asked him to appear for questioning on november 2.the second was sent on december 18 asking him to appear for questioning on december 21.the third summons asked him to appear on wednesday.

title: Kejriwal skips ED summons for 3rd time in liquorgate
summarized_content: looks like you are already logged in from more than 3 devices!to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.to continue logging in remove at least one device from the below list.this is the third time kejriwal refused to appear before the investigators who want to seek his statement in the liqourgate where the delhi government has been accused of tailoring the policy for the benefit of a select few businessmen and for seeking bribes in lieu of that.new delhi january 3.aap says the summons are illegal and meant to arrest him.share.read later.photo credit.shashi shekhar kashyap.delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal skipped the summons issued against him by the enforcement directorate seeking his presence on wednesday in the excise policy case as the aam admi party (aap) said that it was illegal and meant to arrest him head of elections.the agency wants to seek his statement to know about charges that a ₹100 crore bribe collected from the liquor lobby was used to fund goa elections on the destruction of evidence in mobile phones used by him and his jailed former deputy chief minister manish sisodia apart from other issues.delhi cm was questioned by the central bureau of investigation in the case in april but had not been made an accused by the agency.the delhi ruling party however clarified that kejriwal was ready to cooperate with the agency but claimed that the summons was sent with the intention of arresting him.

title: "Arvind Kejriwal Shaking In Fear": BJP On Chief Minister Evading Summons
summarized_content: "if you have not done any dishonesty what is there to be scared of.(arvind) kejriwal should have appeared before the ed and answered its questions" the bjp leader said asking aap national convenor to "let the truth come out".mr bhatia also targeted the india bloc of opposition parties questioning their "silence" on the issue of corruption.promotedlisten to the prime minister narendra modi's government has zero tolerance for corruption and the probe agencies have been given a "free hand" to work independently and take action against graft the bjp leader added.'arvind kejriwal shaking in fear' bjp on chief minister evading ed summons."arvind kejriwal shaking in fear" bjp on chief minister evading summons arvind kejriwal is "shaking in fear" and not appearing before enforcement directorate bjp claimednew delhi delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal is "shaking in fear" and not appearing before the enforcement directorate because he knows that he is the "kingpin" of the alleged liquor policy scam the bjp said today.the bjp's reaction came after mr kejriwal skipped the third summons issued by the enforcement directorate (ed) in the delhi excise policy case and sent a written reply calling the notice "illegal".reacting sharply bjp national spokesperson gaurav bhatia said "outright dishonest and sinister arvind kejriwal is shaking in fear and making one after another lame excuse to skip ed summons.mr arvind kejriwal you are not above the law" he charged saying it is the right of the probe agencies to take action against corruption "as per evidence".mr bhatia said that if mr kejriwal felt that the ed had issued summons to him out of any alleged "political vendetta" he should have approached the court seeking relief.

title: Arvind Kejriwal 'shaking in fear', says BJP after Delhi CM skips ED summons
summarized_content: prime minister narendra modi's government has zero tolerance for corruption and the probe agencies have been given a "free hand" to work independently and take action against graft the bjp leader added.follow us on social media visual stories  electionstop trends.arvind kejriwal (pti) new delhi delhi chief minister arvind kejriwal is "shaking in fear" and not appearing before the enforcement directorate because he knows that he is the "kingpin" of the alleged liquor policy scam the  said on wednesday."it won't be wrong to say that kejriwal is afraid today because he knows that his arrest is imminent he is aware that he is the kingpin and has no answers (to ed's questions).

title: "Something To Hide": BJP On Arvind Kejriwal Skipping Probe Agency Summons
summarized_content: indeed these agencies are not doing their work but putting pressure on the opposition leaders" the congress leader said while speaking to ani.the delhi cm earlier in the day evaded the enforcement directorate summons to appear for questioning in connection with the alleged delhi liquor scam case.ed issued a third summons to cm kejriwal earlier on december 22 last year in connection with the excise policy case asking him to appear before the agency on january 3.as per the party sources mr kejriwal in his reply to ed has expressed his readiness to cooperate with the investigation but declined to appear today calling the notice "illegal".mr kejriwal further questioned the timing of the notice as a move to stop him from election campaign ahead of the upcoming parliamentary elections the party sources said.mr kejriwal was not named as an accused in the first information report (fir) filed by the cbi on august 17 last year.in february 2023 deputy cm manish sisodia was arrested by the cbi for alleged irregularities in the framing and implementation of the now-scrapped delhi's new excise policy.the policy was withdrawn amid allegations of foul play by the opposition.meanwhile ed conducted raids at the premises of press advisor to jharkhand chief minister hemant soren earlier in the day in connection to an alleged land mining case linked to money laundering.as per the agency sources raids were conducted at 12 locations including the residence of cm's press advisor.promotedlisten to the (except for the headline this story has not been edited by ndtv staff and is published from a syndicated feed.

title: Explained: What Next After Arvind Kejriwal Skips 3rd Probe Agency Summons
summarized_content: failure to comply with an nbw may lead to arrest and subsequent court proceedings.arvind kejriwal's legal optionsthe delhi chief minister maintains that he is prepared to cooperate with the agency but questions the timing and urgency of the summons.kejriwal's refusal to appear before the ed on two previous occasions has escalated the tension between the aap and the investigative agency.mr kejriwal has at least two legal avenues available to him.the delhi chief minister maintains that he is prepared to cooperate with the agency but questions the timing and urgency of the summons.
